section.title: Configuration
section.para: Base RA entity supports four configuration properties that must be correctly configured before the RA can function correctly. RA supports two configuration properties, one for authentication applications and one for accounting applications.
The following named properties are available for the Base RA:
The configuration properties can be configured using the following methods:

listitem.para: Using Java XML Mapping (JXM) operations, available through the Management Console.
Manually declaring the property pairs in the resource-adaptor-jar.xml file within the base-ra-[version]-DU.jar, base-ra-[version].jar, or META-INF files.

section.para: Each property consists of value pairs. Value pairs are separated from each other with "," . Each value pair consists of two long numbers separated with ":". First number indicate vendor of supported application. Second is application id arbitrary assigned by IANA.
Each value pair identifies application that Base RA should advertise as supported. Some application do not have vendor assigned. In this case "0" is to be used as vendor id.

example.title: Configuring
example.para: The following XML sample demonstrates how to configure an authentication application and two accounting applications in the resource-adaptor-jar.xml. Note that each configuration property pair contains an equal value pair length.
example.programlisting:
<config-property> <description>List of supported Authorization Application Ids in form of {vendor}:{application-id}, separated by comma (',')</description> <config-property-name>authApplicationIds</config-property-name> <config-property-type>java.lang.String</config-property-type> <config-property-value>193:19302</config-property-value> </config-property>
<config-property> <description>List of supported Accounting Application Ids in form of {vendor}:{application-id}, separated by comma (',')</description> <config-property-name>acctApplicationIds</config-property-name> <config-property-type>java.lang.String</config-property-type> <config-property-value>0:0, 193:19302</config-property-value> </config-property>
